article.headline: Colgate 70, Juniata College 47
article.story: HAMILTON, N.Y. (AP) -- Andrew Zidar scored 14 points and grabbed seven rebounds to lead Colgate to a 70-47 win over Juniata on Saturday. Colgate (2-2) had all 15 players score while holding Juniata to just under 35 percent shooting. Jon Simon added 10 points for the Raiders. Kyle Roemer had nine points and Alvin Reed seven. Brian Cannon led Juniata (1-3) with 12 points. He was the only Juniata player to reach double figures in scoring. Juniata opened a 5-0 lead to start the game before Colgate went on a 24-6 run to open a 13-point advantage with 8:47 remaining in the first half. The Raiders extended their lead to 17 points before settling for a 38-24 halftime lead. Colgate out-rebounded the Eagles 38-32 while shooting 49 percent from the field.
